subject: Re: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are accepting your debt request
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$292,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simplified form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://siruisxkcinaltd.com/
